title: Sona Q Causing Lag again?
body:
Was playing a few games today over both my accounts and noticed that the games with Sona on the enemy team (never had one on mine) would have an insane frame drop for me whenever Sona used Q (i believe it was Q could have really been any of them too laggy to tell). I will try to go into a custom and see if it can be repeated but since I was running at around 240 FPS before Sona frame kill then on 4 FPS after whichever ability I would be amazed if it was related to my PC. Is anyone else experiencing  a similar issue? 


NOTE: All updates were checked between games and almost 2 hours passed between the games. 

NOTE 2: I believe it is Sona related because of a few things. 1) When Sona died I never ONCE in EITHER GAME experienced any frame dropping. 2) I asked her to use Q then W then E each 10 seconds apart once she respawned and my frames tanked (217 FPS down to 11 FPS) but because of the severity of the lag I could not tell which ability caused it (she was NOT visible on my screen).

As I stated I am going to try and test this out later and will hopefully post a video to it (not sure I want to upload to my channel research Riot should be able to do themselves) but regardless will add more details when I have tested this theory, if you are able to test it and can record/upload do so if you please.

replies.body:
Hi GG Mezzie,

This is a known issue I believe, but it's something that should be reported in the Bug Reports forum:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report

Generally from what I've seen Sona's first Q in a game will cause a minor freeze/lagspike, then it clears up from there.

Link to an unrelated issue. I asked Sona to use her abilities 10 seconds apart starting at either 26:30 or 36:30, also if you would have read the post and not the title there are about 8 points that would have atleast hinted that it was not the first Q only
